    Catalogs



Catalogs include descriptions of courses, pre-requisites and suggested programs of study for all majors offered.
Current Catalog
Catalogs have a new home beginning with the 2019-2020 academic year.

Prior Catalogs
For current students admitted in recent years, refer to these prior catalogs.
If you encounter any difficulty in accessing the information in the catalogs listed on this page, please email accessibility@chapman.edu or visit our page for reporting accessibility concerns.
